summary: Removes scratches on the face from all the NPC\'s in game. -Subconscious
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=300][color=red][b]. . : : Without A Scratch : : . .[/b][/color][/size][/center]



[size=4][color=#87fdce][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size][size=4][color=white][b] Removes scratches on the face from all the NPC\'s in game. Using Saadia as an example, if you install this MOD the scratches on her face will be gone. This is done to any NPC in the game that has scratches on their face.[/b][/color][/size][size=4][color=red][b] THIS IS NOT A NEW SKIN TEXTURE. THIS WILL NOT REPLACE ANY OF YOUR SKIN, FACE, BODY TEXTURES. THIS JUST REMOVES THE SCRATCH :][/b][/color][/size]





[center][size=7][color=red][b]---> IF YOU NEED A BETTER EXPLANATION OF WHAT THIS MOD DOES JUST LOOK AT THE IMAGES SECTION <---[/b][/color][/size][/center]





[size=4][color=#87fdce][b]Types:[/b][/color][/size][size=4][color=white][b] There is 3 folders in the download section.[/b][/color][/size]

[list]
[*] [size=3][color=red][b] \"Without A Scratch FULL\"[/b][/color][/size] - [size=3][color=white][b] This version removes scratches from both the male and female NPC\'s in the game.[/b][/color][/size]

[*] [size=3][color=red][b]\"Without A Scratch MALE ONLY\"[/b][/color][/size] - [size=3][color=white][b] This version removes scratches from only the MALE NPC\'s in the game.[/b][/color][/size]

[*] [size=3][color=red][b]\"Without A Scratch FEMALE ONLY\"[/b][/color][/size] - [size=3][color=white][b] This Version removes the scratches from only the FEMALE NPC\'s in the game.[/b][/color][/size][/list]





[size=4][color=#87fdce][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size] 

[list]
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Download your desired choice.[/b][/color][/size] 
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Open up the archive folder.[/b][/color][/size] 
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Drag and drop the \"textures\" folder into your Skyrim/Data folder.[/b][/color][/size] 
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Overwrite if asked.[/b][/color][/size]
[*] [size=4][color=white][b]Enjoy![/b][/color][/size][/list]













[center][size=300][color=#FFFC17][b][S].[U].[B].[C].[O].[N].[S].[C].[I].[O].[U].[S][/b][/color][/size][/center]
author: Subconscious
